channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:49 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 22:49 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Stay tuned for further reports. #Винницка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
